3rd Annual New Year's Day with Sliding Scale or Pay-it-forward

Open from 11:30am to 3:30pm (must be seated by 3:30 pm)

TO MAKE A RESERVATION CALL 978/922-0004. Visit www.organicgardencafe.com

In the true spirit of this holiday season, we are offering a slightly limited menu* on a sliding scale on New Years Day, January 1st.

* sliding scale is available on the following: Entrees, Salads and Bowls

Pay from $0 to full price, or by paying more you can take this opportunity to "Pay it Forward" for others in need of an inspirational meal!

In the spirit of this special day, we also will have a community table for those who wish to make new friends and share glad tidings! So make a reservation & let others know you are coming!

Come and be part of a joyous event and history in the making!

Our normal menu prices are already the best deal in organic & raw cuisine and there is no pressure for you to pay more or less than the standard price. Consider this day to be one of the early seedlings of a new paradigm for business enterprise, 'Pay-It-Forward Commerce'. You get the opportunity to be on either side of the equation, if you choose so, (or right in the middle); as it is good to receive and it is good to give.

Thanks for making our last Pay-it-forward New Year's Weekend a success!

Rawbert and the Amazing OG TEAM
item.name: New Year's Day @ Organic Garden - Sliding Scale Menu
